1.0.0.name: wordpress/a-to-z-listing-by-alphabet
1.0.0.description:
1.plugin will list alphabets A-Z.

2.When user hovers over any alphabet it will lists posts, pages title starting with the alphabet user hovers.

3.The titles will have link and it will take user to single page.

you need to use a shortcode to embed the listing in a post or page.

Example: 1. [atoz] 2. [atoz type="page"] 3. [atoz type="category" title="A-Z Category"] note: default values are type="post" title="A to Z listing"

This plugin is brought to you by WPoets development team.
